mapper.select: select * from PersonnelManagement where (id=(select MAX(id) from (select id from PersonnelManagement where name="SGMW")) )
select * from PersonnelManagement where (id=(select MAX(id) from (select id from PersonnelManagement where name="外包")) )
select * from PersonnelManagement where (date >=#{date1} and date <= #{date2}) and (name="SGMW")
select * from PersonnelManagement where (date >=#{date1} and date <= #{date2}) and (name="外包")
mapper.insert: insert into PersonnelManagement( name, establishment, actualNumber, availableNumber, attendanceRate, shouldArrive,actualArrive) values (#{name},#{establishment},#{actualNumber},#{ availableNumber},#{ attendanceRate},#{shouldArrive},#{actualArrive})
